:design.description: Specifications can be customized through some custom interaction specifications that belong to customization
:design.description_zh: 规范，可以通过该属于定制一些自定义的交互规范

:tag.description: Whether it's wrapped in an element, if it's vue2 and doesn't have a single node, the component automatically creates a div
:tag.description_zh: 是否被元素包裹, 如果是vue2且没有一个单一节点, 组件会自动创建一个div
